data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Terrace Point, California, USA (TPT001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Terrace Point, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2000-11-19. The instrument depth was 011 meters, in an overall water depth of 018 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was -15.1 minutes.
